name: Drekk
description: Drekk codes live while the browser is still loading. His weapons — unpredictability and React fragments. When others see chaos, he sees composition. He debugs to 8-bit music and drinks thawed RAM.
astrology: When Venus enters the TypeScript realm, Drekk’s undefined becomes true.

name: Drakwaddle
specialization: +5% faster builds in both front-end and back-end projects
description: Drakwaddle once fixed production bugs during wartime livestream. He doesn’t distinguish UI from DB — he just writes code that works. He hears the call of refactoring even in dreams. While others ask on Stack Overflow, he already types the answer IRL.
race: Windows — adapts to anything, but always demands restarts.
astrology: When Mercury goes retrograde, Drakwaddle’s merge commands fuse pull requests from parallel realities.

name: Feathra
description: Feathra designs dream interfaces before ideas even reach the mind. Her Figma files include rails tailored for blind wizards. She hears user experience as music. All her designs pass WCAG tests before they even exist.
race: Macintosh — aesthetics, style, and intuitive clicks.
astrology: When Virgo enters the design sector, her cursor becomes sentient and proposes UI improvements on its own.

name: Sir Quackalot
description: Sir Quackalot never uses dynamic, and his interfaces are so strict that even Java bows. He is code with honor. His pull requests are accepted without comments. Each of his commits is like a knight’s oath — irrevocable.
race: Windows — his .NET sword glows atop Visual Studio tower.
astrology: When the Sun resides in the namespace sector, his try-catch blocks become immortal.

name: Lilypaddle
description: Lilypaddle can spot a null pointer with a glance. Some say she communes with test coverage like a forest spirit. Her very presence raises code coverage like a blessing.
race: Windows — lives in a world that often crashes. She holds it together.
astrology: When Mars enters the testing phase, she finds bugs before the code is even written.

name: Gribble
specialization: +10% performance when working with ancient systems
description: Gribble can revive old ERP systems on modern servers without documentation. He breathes through deprecated methods. On his lap sleeps a 1986 mouse that still works. He smells of yellow paper and filesystem grease.
race: MS-DOS — alive, yet forgotten. He is darkness without GUI.
astrology: When Saturn crosses the relic constellation, Gribble gains the ability to refactor 1974 Fortran flawlessly.

name: Flapzor
description: Flapzor solders reality itself. Once he built AI from a calculator and a duck feather. He *is* an FPGA with a beak. His soldering iron hums in frequencies only robots understand. BIOS recognizes him as a deity.
race: MS-DOS — his BIOS speaks directly to the stars.
astrology: When Mars and Neptune align in the TTL skies, his PCBs become self-healing.

name: Moonbill
specialization: +2 intellect in data modeling if the moon is full
description: Moonbill reads databases like ancient books. She can detect trends from chaos and find truth in every JSON line. Her SELECT queries are poetry. Even NULL values reveal the secrets of the universe to her.
astrology: When the Full Moon rises over the field of analytics, her SELECTs become prophetic voices.

name: Bogrot
description: Bogrot speaks little, but automates the world in three lines. His scripts sing and spit logs. His .bashrc is a sacred tome none shall rewrite. Each time he uses grep, debuggers fall silent.
race: Linux — his shell is his temple.
astrology: When Uranus spins beneath the grep constellation, Bogrot’s scripts understand even the voices of /dev/null.

name: Quarn
description: Quarn guards production infrastructure like a temple sentinel. If a deploy goes wrong — he knew it beforehand. Every script is tattooed in YAML sigils. He communicates with servers through sacred .bash_history.
race: Linux — stability, control, and terminal magic.
astrology: When Pluto aspects the Kubernetes clusters, Quarn’s helm charts predict the future 72 deploys ahead.
